attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due the amount of criminal damage and injury to the law abiding citizens of this country I declare that we bring back the beat bobby, if we have a regular policeman pounding the streets I bet you will see less crime and less cost to the goverment for clearing up after the little blighters!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Bobbies-Helmets/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
